        public void scheduleInternalEvent(String name,
                                  Date time,
                                  String message,
                                  String reference)
        Schedule a timer task, or a delayed event
        Parameters:
        name - event name
        time - this must be database time (such as new Date(DatabaseAccess.getCurrentTime()+difference_in_milliseconds)
        message - message content for delayed event; null o/w
